original_text: And this shall be a sign unto thee, Ye shall eat this year such as groweth of itself; and the second year that which springeth of the same: and in the third year sow ye, and reap, and plant vineyards, and eat the fruit thereof.
korean_text: 왕이여 이것이 왕에게 징조가 되리니 올해는 스스로 난 것을 먹을 것이요 둘째 해에는 또 거기에서 난 것을 먹을 것이요 셋째 해에는 심고 거두며 포도나무를 심고 그 열매를 먹을 것이니이다

sentences.original_text: And this shall be a sign unto thee
Ye shall eat this year such as groweth of itself
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 올해 저절로 자라나는 것을 먹을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and the second year that which springeth of the same
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이듬해에는 그 뿌리에서 나는 것을 먹을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and in the third year sow ye
